title: Hans-Jürgen Wittkamp
text: Hans-Jürgen Wittkamp (born July 23, 1947) is a German former <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He spent 11 seasons in the <a href="Fu%C3%9Fball-Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> with <a href="FC%20Schalke%2004">FC Schalke 04</a> and <a href="Borussia%20M%C3%B6nchengladbach">Borussia Mönchengladbach</a>.
